Articles.Content:
A new line of high tech atmospheric planes. all have a high speed for there class (low or high altitude). Also there equipped with taxi wheels that allow them to easily be maneuvered and the ground. There are 2 low Alt. and 2 high Alt. planes in this series.

group photo

Download

will have spaceport download when it starts to work for me

more photos

and the taxi wheel. great for putting plane in a hangar (just lower front gear )

Hope you like them

Edited June 17, 2013 by brobel
Indeed. A triumph of simplicity and style... Well done man. Well done.

Just a concern: won't the taxi wheels burst on takeoff? And since they aren't retractable, wouldn't it look weird after takeoff? The only solution I see to this would be putting the wheel on a decoupler to remove it before takeoff.
no they don't burst on takeoff and yes they do look a little weird when gear are retracted. working on a fix for that (the fix will probably will be introduced in my next series )
Nice! Mind if I steal the taxi wheel concept? I've been working on a sort of simplistic recreational plane, and it happens to be a taildragger. I personally think that would go awesome with it.
yea sure thats why i put these things out here to give people ideas and something fun to play with
i have a question. im planing on making another series but i dont know what to call it (this is the x series). what should i call it
